Pistols.help: You fire a single shot from one of your pistols, which deals lethal damage to your target. Flying targets are brought to the ground. Note that Single Shot is unaffected by Range changes. Recharge: Fast

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
You are unable to fly due to {PlayerSource}'s {PowerName}.

Dual_Wield.help: You fire a single shot from both of your pistols, which deals lethal damage to your target. Flying targets are brought to the ground. Note that Dual Shot is unaffected by Range changes. Recharge: Moderate

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
You are unable to fly due to {PlayerSource}'s {PowerName}.

Empty_Clips.help: You empty all the bullets from your pistols in a wide arc, hitting multiple targets in front of you. These targets suffer lethal damage, which lingers for a short while. Recharge: Moderate
Empty_Clips.targetHelp: You are suffering lethal damage over time.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage over time.

Bullet_Rain.help: You fire your pistols in an acrobatic motion, catching all opponents in a targeted area in a storm of bullets. These deal lethal damage, and the targets can be hit by multiple bullets. There is a chance affected targets will also be knocked down. Note that Wrangler's Storm is unaffected by Range changes. Recharge: Slow
Bullet_Rain.shortHelp: Ranged (Targeted AoE), Moderate DMG(Lethal), Moderate DoT(Lethal), -Fly(Foe)
Bullet_Rain.targetHelp: You are suffering lethal damage over time and are unable to fly.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage over time.
You are unable to fly due to {PlayerSource}'s {PowerName}.

Suppressive_Fire.help: You quickly fire several special rounds at your target, seeking to suppress rather than overwhelm. If the bullets find their mark, the target suffers minor lethal damage and is stunned for a short while. Note that Rapid Fire is unaffected by Range changes. Recharge: Slow

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

Executioners_Shot.help: You take great care to aim at your target, hitting them squarely with a well-placed shot. The target suffers heavy lethal damage and is knocked down. Note that Dead-Eye is unaffected by Range changes. Recharge: Slow

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
You are unable to fly due to {PlayerSource}'s {PowerName}.

Piercing_Rounds.help: You fire your pistols with great precision, striking any opponents in a cone in front of you. The affected targets suffer lethal damage and reduced resistance to damage of all kinds. Note that Piercing Rounds is unaffected by Range changes. Recharge: Slow

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

Exhausting_Shot.help: You fire a specialized bullet of your creation at your target, inflicting them with a poison that rapidly exhausts their body. The targets suffer no damage, but instead lose endurance and endure reduced regeneration, recovery and damage output. Note that Exhausting Shot is unaffected by Range changes. Recharge: Slow
Exhausting_Shot.targetHelp: You are suffering from reduced regeneration, recovery and damage output. Additionally, you suffer from a brief endurance drain and are unable to fly.

messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} strikes you with an {PowerName}, draining some endurance and reducing your damage potential, recovery and regeneration.
You are unable to fly due to {PlayerSource}'s {PowerName}.

Hail_of_Bullets.help: You fire a hail of bullets at enemies all around you, dealing lethal damage and potentially knocking affected targets down. Because of the wild nature of your fighting, you won't always hit every target every time. However, your final shots tend to strike true and will knock down affected targets. Recharge: Slow
Hail_of_Bullets.shortHelp: PBAoE, -Fly, Chance for Superior DMG(Lethal), Knockdown(Foe)

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage over time.
